fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Energy Union, 2030 Framework for climate and energy policies, ETS, Circular Economy, Energy Winter Package.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Turboden is actively involved in a number of associations and working groups at international, EU and national level: 
- COGENEurope 
- EGEC 
- Energy Efficiency Financial Institutions Group (EEFIG) 
- EITP Deep Geothermal 
- Confindustria (Anima-Italcogen) 
- Elettricità Futura 
- FIRE
goals__remit:
Turboden is a leading company in the development and production of ORC (Organic Rankine Cycle) turbogenerators for the combined generation of heat and power from renewable sources (biomass, geothermal, solar) and heat recovery from industrial processes.  
Founded in 1980, Turboden has been part of the Mitsubishi Heavy Industries group since 2013.  
So far Turboden has installed more than 350 plants worldwide.
